> OOC - Writing this here, and I assume all the Maximals/Predacons are
> together with Tuscon.  if I'm incorrect in things (aka they're separated
> while being rushed by the Sharkticons), let me know and will rewrite!

OOC: Basically they are kind of bunched up, yep. :)

> <OLD>
>
> As they were seemingly rusehd by a legion of SHARKTICONS, the PREDACONS were
> faced with a contradiction from the days of old  - the Predacacons were
> barely in many cases bigger than the Sharkticons, who had much more intense
> numbers and were deadly in close range!
>
> DINOBOT fell back, "WE will be overwhelmed in close quarters.  Suggestions?"
>
> His optic lasers doing minimal damage then!
>
> DRILL BIT called out, "He who fights and runs away.."
>
> VICE GRIP trying to then sue his diggers to smash over under the ground to
> collapse the floor out from underneath the SHARKTICONS!

The cracks that had appeared in the floor were widening into fissues,
fissues that were draining off the water that TUSCON had brought
crashing into this chamber. However these same fissures were also
making it difficult for the SHARKTICONS to advance across the rough
and shaky terrain.

VICE GRIP's attempt to collapse the floor was assisted by the
expanding cracks that were still stretching across it. Several
SHARKTICONS fell into them and disappeared from view.

However these SHARKTICONS were not the ones of old from the days of
UNICRON! They had been advanced and were slimmer and seemed to be a
little more designed to fight, although not all that much more
intelligent.

http://tfwiki.net/w2/images2/d/d4/ESharkticon.jpg

"Spread out!" SKY SHADOW said as he and his FUZORS were doing just
that. "These guys are idiots! they don't do well without leadership."

"The pits is empty and all the devils are here." There was laughter
from SKYBYTE the leader of the SHARKTICONS as he stood as his soldiers
continued to pour out of the caves! "Come my devils, rise! RISE!" With
that he transformed into his shark mode and began to fly as did the
SHARTICONS with him rising around the upper sides of the massive cave!

With large, micro serrated teeth at least three launched themselves at
DINOBOT, coming at him with a menacing ferocity!

Meanwhile RAT TRAP and QUICKSTRIDE face their own enemies as each of
them have two SHARKTICONS flying at them, their mouths open wide, the
teeth ready to rend flesh, bone and metal!

VICEGRIP is also beset with SHARKTICONS of his own as they circled
around to strike at him!

OOC: Don't forget, they are Sharkticons, individually they are push
overs - although there are a lot of them.

> <OLD>
>
> With the blast coming fast and furious, Tucson swiftly reacts and without
> a fit of rage but a quiet, swift and graceful interlude of dexterity and
> balance, he attempts to deflect the blast with a complex blocking maneuver
> using a combination of Tai Chi and deflective artistry only taught by
> Yoketron himself, which was rarely taught to anyone except to those he
> felt were deserving of the training.  Tucson was one of those students
> worthy of such an ancient art.  He performs the maneuver in draconic form,
> as he gracefully twists his body around to attempt to meet the blast with
> his blocking maneuver.  He spins swiftly on one foot, as his tail coils
> around his body as part of the block.  He hoped it would help, his
> comrades were depending on him.
>
> It would almost appear that Master Yoketron was alive and well inside
> Tucson.

OOC: I am unsure what Tuscon is using to actually block the Plasma
blast coming from Magmatron? I am running with the thought that he is
using a part of his body, an arm, leg, tail?

<BACK IN CHARACTER>

The blast that contacts TUSCON is super heated ionized matter heated
to the point that it is almost energy, sweeping across him and the
others almost like water from a hose. It has the capacity to literally
melt the hardest metals and evaporate the lesser ones. It was this
that TUSCON was trying to block, the searing hot material spraying
across him!

LEO PRIME leaped back well aware of the lethal properties of plasma!
His movements were agile and well coordinated as he landed in a squat
his weapons out and firing at the much larger MAGMATRON!

BIG CONVOY grunted as the Plasma caught him in the chest knocking him
backwards through the air and sent him slamming into the ground, his
broad chest black and burnt, smoke rising from its surface!

"Is that all you've got?" CONVOY chuckled as he struggled to sit up
and then coughed up a dark fluid. It's going to take more than that!"
Despite his bravado he was slow about getting to his feet.

MAGMATRON laughed as he watched the result, LEO PRIME's attack seeming
to be little more than an annoyance as he brushed it off.

The dark form of the evil RODIMUS just stared down TUSCON and the
others, his weapon out, but casually slung over his shoulder. "What of
Optimus?" DARK RODIMUS said with a casual disdain.

"Finish him." MAGMATRON said, "He is nothing to us now but an empty shell."

DARK RODIMUS nodded and turned away he could see CRYOTEK moving
through the air at OPTIMUS PRIME as well, now in his great draconic
form his wings outstretched. "Now, you are mine! There is no one here
to protect you from my breath! from my final attack!"

With a final beat of his wing he looked as if he were taking a breath,
the very air becoming frosty and cold as he smiled at the blackened
form of OPTIMUS PRIME . . . when a cannon blast erupted across the
room lighting it up for a moment and struck CRYOTEK full on in the
chest!

>>KRACKTHOOM!!<<

"Not while there is a amp left in my spark chamber will you touch the
frame of Optimus ever again!" said a familiar voice, one that caused
DARK RODIMUS and even MAGMATRON to pause and look over.


The voice was that of RODIMUS PRIME, standing resplendently on the
other side of the room, smoke rising from the business end of his
weapon.
CRYOTEK landed in a heap on the far side of the battle, his wings
burnt and tangled.

Around RODIMUS were standing four strange looking figures, three male
and one female.

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/photos/album/306782857/pic/1443963172/view

(TAG)

- Preston
